data.title: Choquet Integrals With Respect to Non-Monotonic Set Functions
data.text:
TY - UNPB

T1 - Choquet Integrals With Respect to Non-Monotonic Set Functions

AU - De Waegenaere, A.M.B.

AU - Wakker, P.P.

N1 - Pagination: 25

PY - 1997

Y1 - 1997

N2 - This paper introduces the signed Choquet integral, i.e., a nonmonotonic generalization of the Choquet integral. Applications to welfare theory, multi-period optimization, and asset pricing are described.

AB - This paper introduces the signed Choquet integral, i.e., a nonmonotonic generalization of the Choquet integral. Applications to welfare theory, multi-period optimization, and asset pricing are described.

KW - Choquet integral

KW - comonotonicity

KW - arbitrage

KW - time preference

M3 - Discussion paper

VL - 1997-44

T3 - CentER Discussion Paper

BT - Choquet Integrals With Respect to Non-Monotonic Set Functions

PB - Accounting

CY - Tilburg

ER -
